item.title: Fatigue
item.description: [[songs/e/eluveitie/slania/bloodstained_ground.md#what-do-you-see-in-me-vyl-wnanory|A path in a dim light]] [[songs/e/eluveitie/slania/bloodstained_ground.md#what-do-you-see-in-me-vyl-wnanory|that I have to walk myself.]] [[songs/s/shakespears_sister/sacred_heart/heaven_is_in_your_arms.md#i-read-in-this-months-passion-magazine-vyl-wnanory|Rain falling from my lips,]] [[songs/s/shakespears_sister/sacred_heart/heaven_is_in_your_arms.md#i-read-in-this-months-passion-magazine-vyl-wnanory|the most cleanest of all.

item.title: Heretoir
item.description: [[songs/p/panic_at_the_disco/death_of_a_bachelor/house_of_memories.md#memories-turn-into-daydreams-vyl-wnanory|All my memories]] [[songs/p/panic_at_the_disco/death_of_a_bachelor/house_of_memories.md#memories-turn-into-daydreams-vyl-wnanory|shattered]] [[songs/p/panic_at_the_disco/death_of_a_bachelor/house_of_memories.md#memories-turn-into-daydreams-vyl-wnanory|into thousand pieces.]] [[songs/d/dead_by_april/dead_by_april/trapped.md#all-of-my-dreams-are-all-i-see-i-see-vyl-wnanory|Same illusions]] [[songs/d/dead_by_april/dead_by_april/trapped.md#all-of-my-dreams-are-all-i-see-i-see-vyl-wnanory|everywhere I look,]] [[songs/d/dead_by_april/dead_by_april/trapped.md#all-of-my-dreams-are-all-i-see-i-see-vyl-wnanory|starting through]] [[songs/d/dead_by_april/dead_by_april/trapped.md#all-of-my-dreams-are-all-i-see-i-see-vyl-wnanory|these walls of glass.]] [[songs/p/placebo/sleeping_with_ghosts/the_bitter_end.

item.title: To Follow the Sun
item.description: [[songs/d/dead_by_april/incomparable/lost.md#my-mind-cries-lost-vyl-wnanory|War skin,]] [[songs/d/dead_by_april/incomparable/lost.md#my-mind-cries-lost-vyl-wnanory|comforting hope]] [[songs/d/dead_by_april/incomparable/lost.md#my-mind-cries-lost-vyl-wnanory|and rays of orange light.]] [[songs/b/bring_me_the_horizon/sempiternal/go_to_hell_for_heavens_sake.md#when-did-the-diamonds-leave-your-bones-vyl-wnanory|When I spread my arms]] [[songs/b/bring_me_the_horizon/sempiternal/go_to_hell_for_heavens_sake.md#when-did-the-diamonds-leave-your-bones-vyl-wnanory|I leave anything behind.]] [[songs/m/moby/play/porcelain.
